tool_description: Validates and standardizes patient clinical data for downstream risk assessment tools, ensuring data quality and completeness.

data_format.description: Input data format: HL7, FHIR, CSV, JSON

error_messages: Invalid patient ID format: Patient ID must be alphanumeric and 3-20 characters long
Unsupported data format: Use one of [HL7, FHIR, CSV, JSON]
Missing required fields: Essential patient demographics or clinical data missing
Data integrity check failed: Inconsistent or corrupted data detected
usage: Provide patient_id and data_format. Set validation_level for desired strictness. Tool validates data structure, completeness, and basic clinical value ranges.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, warning

validated_fields.description: List of successfully validated data fields

data_quality_score.description: Quality score from 0-100 based on completeness and validity
